name: ORD_SCHED_INSTR
description: Appointments can be scheduled from an order. This table contains scheduling instructions for an appointment created from an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique system identifier of the order record (ORD dot one)

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_SCHED_INSTR
columns.description: This column contains scheduling instructions for appointments scheduled from the associated order.
